ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | lsmub1.p | |- .(+) = ( LSSum ` G ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_lsmss1 | |- ( ( T e. ( SubGrp ` G ) /\ U e. ( SubGrp ` G ) /\ T C_ U ) -> ( T .(+) U ) = U ) |
| 3 | 2 | #P_3expia | |- ( ( T e. ( SubGrp ` G ) /\ U e. ( SubGrp ` G ) ) -> ( T C_ U -> ( T .(+) U ) = U ) ) |
| 4 | 1 | #P_lsmub1 | |- ( ( T e. ( SubGrp ` G ) /\ U e. ( SubGrp ` G ) ) -> T C_ ( T .(+) U ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_sseq2 | |- ( ( T .(+) U ) = U -> ( T C_ ( T .(+) U ) <-> T C_ U ) ) |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_syl5ibcom | |- ( ( T e. ( SubGrp ` G ) /\ U e. ( SubGrp ` G ) ) -> ( ( T .(+) U ) = U -> T C_ U ) ) |
| 7 | 3, 6 | #P_impbid | |- ( ( T e. ( SubGrp ` G ) /\ U e. ( SubGrp ` G ) ) -> ( T C_ U <-> ( T .(+) U ) = U ) ) |
